import React from 'react'; export default function BoardTable({ boardItems, handleRowClick }) { return ( {boardItems.map(board => ( handleRowClick(board)} className="cursor-pointer" style={{ height: '4rem' }} // 각 행의 높이를 일정하게 설정 > ))}
순번 Username Title View Count Create Time
{board.id} {board.username} {board.title} {board.viewcount} {new Date(board.createTime).toLocaleString()}
); }
